ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: good luck on finding a black robe..if you find one  let the group know.  You can get Red robes from Euridin and Purplish robes from Freeport. - Ziffnab ...
ygData.messageBody:
good luck on finding a black robe..if you find one let the group know. You
can get Red robes from Euridin and Purplish robes from Freeport.

- Ziffnab

-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:01 AM
To: EQ WIZARDS
Subject: [eq_wizards] ROBES


I know people already talked about the clothing thing, but can someone give
a breakdown of what color robes can be found where??

SO far all I know is:

Felwithe (high elf city in Greater F.) GREEN ROBE (Sr. Apprentice Robe too)
Gnome city in Steamfont??? YELLOW ROBE (Sr. version?)

I was specifically looking for a RED ROBE or BLACK ROBE . . .

Thanks!!!

-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
